Plot: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.
Title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 7 nominations.
Actors: Renée Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Jim Broadbent, James Faulkner
Writer: Helen Fielding (novel), Andrew Davies (screenplay), Helen Fielding (screenplay), Richard Curtis (screenplay), Adam Brooks (screenplay)
